WorkspaceSid.description: The SID of the Workspace with the resource to fetch.

TaskChannel.description: Only calculate real-time statistics on this TaskChannel. Can be the TaskChannel's SID or its `unique_name`, such as `voice`, `sms`, or `default`.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Worker resource.
**activity_statistics**: The number of current Workers by Activity.
**url**: The absolute URL of the Workers statistics resource.
**workspace_sid**: The SID of the Workspace that contains the Workers.
